summary: The module implements spend‑tracking capabilities for the Litellm proxy. It defines FastAPI routes that expose aggregated cost reports (global, per‑team, per‑user, per‑model, per‑tag) and activity logs, and includes utilities for authenticating privileged access, constructing usage log payloads, and querying aggregated spend data via the Prisma client with token‑hashing support. Cache management functions allow refreshing or resetting stored spend views.
business_intent: Provide administrators and stakeholders with real‑time visibility and control over LLM usage expenses, enabling cost analysis, budgeting, and governance across organizational units.
